overview:
Serial application developer most notably-recognized as the Boca Raton guy who submitted the first social network patent application (June 26, 2003 60/482805 ) just ten days after similar Friendster social networking patent application was submitted in Palo Alto by Abrams. Abram’s patent was purchased by Facebook’s Zuckerberg for $40M in 2010.

Before missing out on the fun by ten days, Mr. Tummolo successfully built internet startup multimedia company, Focus One Media Group, LLC, led and launched IBM’s initial fully-functional web store in 1997 for which he was awarded, worked extensively as an application development consultant for many years, and contributed to the initial launch and success of Prodigy Services Company between 1985 - 1990.

Mr. Tummolo has also been known to dabble in Real Estate investments, making millions doing so, with far better timing than his social media patent efforts.

milestones.description: Designs and implements TRINTEX-PRODIGY staged-diskette common code library ( like .NET CLR ) in 1986.
Invents MyCommunityLink.com, files patent applications, and watches his patent vision get exploited by Facebook "inventors".
